title: PLADO Women's and Girls Georgette Top Maroon
aboutItem: Fabric Size Measurement Details-XS- 34”, Small(S)-36”, Medium(M)- 38”, Large(L)-40, X-Large(XL) - 42", XX-Large(2XL) - 46", 3XL-48”, 4XL-50”. All Measurment is in Inches.
This Top comes with inner body Lining, Two Layers Design, 3/4 Sleeves tops.
Materials:Georgette, Inner Lining breathable and soft Crepe, fabric have no stretch.
Neck Style: Scoop Neck, Sleeves type; Flared Ruffle 3/4 sleeves.
Suitable for Summer, Vacation, Casual Outtings, Office, Work, Leisure, Formal and Daily wear
productDescription: A Stylish Georgette top along with inner lining at body featuring latest flared sleeves design, scoop neck Relaxed fit. Perfect for your everyday use, you could pair it with a stylish pair of Jeans or Trousers and leather or canvas shoes to complete the look.

productDetails.Manufacturer ‏ ‎: PLADO, PNR Enterprises, #5593, Anand Nagar, Ludhiana.

title: FYLTR Men's Solid Slim Fit 100% Cotton Casual Shirt with Button Down Collar & Full Sleeves
aboutItem: Introducing FYLTR Resort collar shirt - made with lightweight & comfortable 100% rayon fabric, this shirt is perfect for every season.
Lightweight & Soft: Made with premium quality rayon fabric, this shirt feels breezy and super soft against your skin.
Flattering Fit: This shirt is made in our favourite regular fit which is roomy around the shoulders, chest & waist yet offers a tailored silhouette that complements any body type.

All-Purpose: Whether you dress it up with a blazer and trousers or dress it down with jeans, this versatile shirt will quickly become a staple in your wardrobe. Available in 6 trendy colors, you'll find the perfect shade to suit your style.

Easy Care: This shirt is designed for maximum convenience, with easy care instructions that make it simple to keep it looking great. Simply machine wash and hang to dry and this shirt will be ready to wear again in no time.
productDescription: Welcome to FYLTR – a new line of casual clothing, featuring only solid colors. We believe that solid colors are more than just a fashion choice, they represent a mindset - a bold statement of timeless elegance. FYLTR is designed for those who appreciate the simplicity and sophistication of solids, and we're proud to be different. We're not here for prints or checks, and we never will be. Our brand is for those who want to join the solids bandwagon and make a bold statement with unwavering confidence. Explore our range of solid-colored casuals for both men and women and experience the unmatched sophistication of FYLTR.

title: FYLTR Women's Soft Cotton Blend Fashion Top with Ruffle Sleeves | Tops for Women | Tops for Women Western
aboutItem: Stay Cool and Chic: Add an extra touch of fashion to your summer wardrobe with this chic women's top featuring pretty ruffle sleeves for a sophisticated touch.

Lightweight and Comfortable: Made with lightweight fabric, this women's top is perfect for staying cool and comfortable in the summer heat. The breathable fabric ensures that you stay comfortable all day long, making it ideal for outdoor events or casual outings.
Flattering and Feminine: Classic cuts combined with easy fits - the feminine design of this top accentuates your figure and is suited for all body types.

Versatile Style: This elegant top is perfect for dressing up or down, making it a versatile addition to your wardrobe. Pair it with your favorite jeans for a casual look or dress it up with a skirt and heels for a more formal occasion.
Easy to Care For: This summer top is machine-washable and easy to care for, making it a low-maintenance addition to your wardrobe.

title: FYLTR Men's Casual Knit Regular Fit Shirt with Spread Collar|Half Sleeve|Textured Patterns
aboutItem: Unique Jacquard Knit Pattern: Stay ahead of the fashion curve with our knit shirts featuring a unique and intricate jacquard pattern. This shirt boasts a bold zig-zag design that makes a statement, no matter what occasion you don it for.

Breathe Easy, Move Freely: Featuring a top-notch cotton blend, this shirt’s as breathable and stretchy as a cool breeze on a summer afternoon. Ideal for lounging or outsmarting your to-do list. Available in two refreshing colors: "Olive Pop" and "Vanilla Bean"

Knit's a Hit: Stand out with our trendy drop-shoulder sleeves and sleek spread collar, designed for effortless style and ultimate comfort that you'll absolutely love. Perfect with jeans or chinos. Get ready for compliments—lots of them!
Easy Does It: Keep it fresh! For best results, toss it in the machine on the delicate cycle and give it a gentle iron on low heat.
